23401634.extract:
Norbert Bolz (born April 17, 1953) is a German philosopher and media theorist. He is a professor at the Technical University of Berlin.
Bolz developed a media theory, the "Theorie der neuen Medien", that is influenced by Friedrich Nietzsche, Walter Benjamin and Marshall McLuhan.


== Film and TV appearances ==
Marx Reloaded, Arte, April 2011.


== External links ==
Profile at the TU Berlin
